page.title: 18GREATWOOD SCHOOL SKIPTON
page.content: Me and my friend attend Greatwood C.P school. This ia a small school of about 220 pupils and serves two large housing estates:{Horse close}and {Greatwood.}There are{seven}class rooms in the main building and{two outdoor {class rooms.}Greatwood has a lage hall which is normaly used for{assembly}and {indoor P.E.}and a much small dinning hall. Greatwood is the only Primary school in Skipton to have been built since the second world war, and the only school in Skipton to have a large playing field surrounding the school. The field is used in warm dry weather, but not when it's winter and when the weather is wet. In summer we play out. We normally play{cricket}or {football. At}morining break we have kind of a{tuck shop}which sells{crisps and{shortbread
